src:
Yang Berbeda dari Reuni 212 Tahun Ini
05 Nov 2019, 06:47 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Reuni 212 diwacanakan kembali digelar. Disebut agenda tahunan, acara ini kemungkinan kembali digelar di Monas, Jakarta.
Persaudaraan Alumni (PA) 212 berencana menggelar acara ini pada Senin (2/12) nanti. Poster acara ini sudah beredar dan tertulis tajuk 'Munajat untuk Keselamatan Negeri. Maulid Agung dan Reuni Alumni 212'.
"Iya, benar, dan ini kan sudah menjadi agenda rutin tahunan," kata juru bicara PA 212 Habib Novel Bamukmin saat dikonfirmasi, Senin (4/11/2019).
Dalam poster tersebut disebutkan Habib Rizieq Syihab direncanakan hadir dalam acara tersebut. Habib Rizieq adalah Pembina Tunggal PA 212.
"Insyaallah kalau tidak ada halangan kami menginginkan Habib Rizieq hadir, namun akan dilihat situasi kondisinya nanti," sebut Novel Bamukmin.
Namun, Reuni 212 ini punya perbedaan dengan Reuni 212 tahun lalu. Apa saja bedanya?
text:
What's Different from this 212 Year Reunion
05 Nov 2019, 06:47 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - 212th reunion is being held again. Called an annual agenda, this event is likely to be held again at Monas, Jakarta.
The Alumni Brotherhood (PA) 212 plans to hold this event on Monday (2/12) later. Posters of this event have been circulating and the headline 'Munajat for State Safety' is written. Great Maulid and Alumni Reunion 212 '.
"Yes, it is true, and this has become an annual event," said PA 212 spokesman Habib Novel Bamukmin when confirmed, Monday (11/04/2019).
The poster mentioned Habib Rizieq Syihab planned to attend the event. Habib Rizieq is the Sole Trustee of PA 212.
"God willing, if there is no obstacle we want Habib Rizieq to attend, but we will see the situation later," said Novel Bamukmin.
However, this 212 Reunion has a difference from last year's 212 Reunion. What are the differences?
